name: Train'n Day
description:
Backpacks are the latest fad in YouTuber merch!?

Play "Train'n Day" and find out if you've got what it takes to make your fortune in the competitive backpack manufacturing & shipping industry!!

MashUp Game Jam generated theme was:

  • Genre: Idle
  • Theme: Replication
  • Setting: Train
  • Item: Backpack

Made with Godot 4 beta 2.
